name: NAME OF EXTENSION

browser_action.default_popup: PATH TO POPUP FOR EXTENSION (OPTIONAL) [ex: popup.html]

permissions: PERMISSIONS LISTED USING COMMAS (OPTIONAL) [more details in PDF file]

matches: WHEN JAVASCRIPT/CSS WORKS, ON WHICH PAGES? CAN BE <all_urls> WHICH MEANS IT WORKS FOR ALL URLS
js: PATH TO JAVASCRIPT FILE (OPTIONAL IF INCLUDE CSS) [ex: script.js]
css: PATH TO CSS FILE (OPTIONAL IF INCLUDE JS) [ex: style.css]
